summary:
### GitHub Notifications Summary

**Repository: PrefectHQ/prefect**

#### CI Activity:
- Multiple workflow runs failed or were cancelled:
  - Issue bot workflow failed for the main branch
  - Integration tests failed for the 2.x branch
  - Integrations Packages Tests failed for the pydantic-settings-v2 branch
  - Cloud API Compatibility, CodeQL, Static analysis, Unit tests, CodSpeed Benchmarks, Markdown tests, and Benchmarks workflows cancelled for the pydantic-settings-v2 branch
  - CodeQL, Static analysis, and Cloud API Compatibility workflows cancelled for the k8s-coerce-env-2.x branch

#### Pull Requests:
- **[Bumps `pytest` and `pytest-asyncio` to the latest versions](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15523)** - Review requested
- **[Use `openapi-ts` to autofetch fetching service layer](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15556)** - Review requested
- **[Update kubernetes requirement](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15464)** - Review requested
- **[Avoid shutting down Ray driver when running on a Ray worker](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15552)** - Review requested
- **[Avoid crashing flows when Kubernetes job watch exits](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15525)** - Review requested

### Urgent Matters:
- The repeated failures of the Issue bot workflow on the main branch and other workflow failures require immediate investigation to ensure continuous integration stability.
